description.value:
Requirements You are in Tenacious Stance.

Using your shield, you guard against the movement of foes as surely as if you were a wall of stone. You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{Raise a Shield} and become anchored for 1 round. While anchored, you gain a +4 circumstance bonus to the DC to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Tumble Through]{Tumble Through} your space.
